function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of remote patient inspection and consulting capability","Impact":"Inability to provide healthcare services remotely, leading to an increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Developing and implementing a telemedicine system","Technologies":"Telemedicine systems","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Medical Software Company"},{"Description":"Closure of fitness centers","Impact":"Loss of access to fitness services and increased sedentary lifestyles, leading to potential health issues","Mitigation":"Experimenting with online gym coaching activities and offering face-to-face outdoor options","Technologies":"Online coaching platforms, outdoor training equipment","People":"Members of fitness centers","Owner":"Fitness center owners"},{"Description":"Food safety concerns and business model challenges","Impact":"Increased consumer distrust and decreased revenue, potential food safety risks","Mitigation":"Trials on vacuum packaging Burger ingredients and implementing more flexible and mobile business models","Technologies":"Vacuum packaging, flexible and mobile business models","People":"Consumers, business owners","Owner":"Mark from Washable Burger"}]}
